title: Greenhouse - Audit Logs
description: This dashboard provides information about the Audit Logs generated on Greenhouse.

definition.content:
Gain better visibility into your organization's security events by monitoring greenhouse audit logs with this dashboard. 

An activity within Greenhouse platform - such as accessing Personally Identifiable Information, changing Single-Sign On, granting temporary access, change in compliance and permission policy, change in API and Webhook permissions can pose significant security risks. The Greenhouse audit logs capture comprehensive records of these activities, providing crucial insights into potential security incidents. Each log includes information like type of activity, the performer, the timestamp, and any changes made. Monitoring these audit logs can help identify any unusual activities or policy violations as they happen, allowing for prompt action to address the issue and prevent further impact. 

With help of audit logs dashboard, organizations can monitor sensitive activities in real time, respond quickly to threats, and maintain a record of all activities for future analysis and compliance.

For more information, see the [Greenhouse Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/greenhouse).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Use the template variables in top left of the dashboard to filter the activities. 
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Audit logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security?query=source%3Agreenhouse).

definition.title: Top Activities in Data Change - Create
Top Activities in Data Change - Update
Top Activities in Data Change - Destroy

search.query: service:audit source:greenhouse @event.target_type:("API Key Created" OR "Single Sign-On Changed" OR "Candidate has been unhired") $Request_ID $Event_Type $Request_Type $Performer_Email $Activity $Performer_Type $Location

service:audit source:greenhouse @event.target_type:("Temporary Access Granted" OR "Temporary Access Revoked") $Request_ID $Event_Type $Request_Type $Performer_Email $Performer_Type $Activity $Location

service:audit source:greenhouse @event.target_type:("GDPR Data Protection Officer Changed" OR "GDPR Legal basis updated" OR "GDPR Rule Modified" OR "Pay Transparency Rule Created" OR "Pay Transparency Rule Changed" OR "Pay Transparency Rule Deleted" OR "GDPR Rule Added" OR "GDPR Rule Deleted") $Request_ID $Event_Type $Request_Type $Performer_Email $Performer_Type $Activity $Location

service:audit source:greenhouse @event.target_type:("Auto Merge Setting Changed" OR "Department/Office Changed" OR "Department/Office Deleted" OR "Org Permission Policy Changed" OR "Organization Name Changed" OR "Next Requisition ID Changed" OR "Department/Office Created" OR "Referral Program Changed") $Request_ID $Event_Type $Request_Type $Performer_Email $Performer_Type $Activity $Location

service:audit source:greenhouse @event.target_type:("Bulk Delete Candidate" OR "Bulk Agency Job Edited" OR "Bulk Copied Rules to Jobs" OR "Bulk Interview Plan Edited" OR "Bulk Reject Candidate" OR "Bulk User Permission Edit" OR "Bulk Job Scorecard Edited" OR "Bulk User Permission Edited" OR "Bulk Deactivate Users" OR "Bulk Import Candidates" OR "Bulk Import Prospects" OR "Bulk Candidate Stage Change") $Request_ID $Event_Type $Request_Type $Performer_Email $Performer_Type $Activity $Location

service:audit source:greenhouse @event.target_type:(Applications OR Candidates OR "API Key Created" OR "API Key Permissions Updated" OR "API Key Re-Enabled" OR "API Key Revoked" OR "API Key Updated") $Request_ID $Event_Type $Request_Type $Performer_Email $Performer_Type $Activity $Location

service:audit source:greenhouse @event.target_type:("Webhook Created" OR "Webhook Changed" OR "Webhook Removed") $Request_ID $Event_Type $Request_Type $Performer_Email $Performer_Type $Activity $Location
